targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean("usage_guest")  + mean("usage_guest_nice") + mean("usage_iowait") + mean("usage_irq") + mean("usage_nice") + mean("usage_softirq") + mean("usage_steal") + mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node" fill(null)
